text: The 2021 World Athletics Relays will be held in Chorzów, Poland from 1 to 2 May 2021. ==References== ==External links== * Official website *IAAF website Category:IAAF World Relays World Relays World Athletics Relays Category:International athletics competitions hosted by Poland World Athletics Relays Athletics World Relays
title: 2021 World Athletics Relays
